SQLite3

https://www.sqlite.org/lang.html https://www.sqlite.org/omitted.html https://www.sqlite.org/lang_keywords.html https://www.sqlite.org/syntaxdiagrams.html

Help

  • List all meta-commands:

    $ sqlite3 <FILE> '.help'

Data Modification

Data Types

Data Type Description
NULL Empty value
INTEGER 8 byte (-9223372036854775808 - 9223372036854775807)

Tables

  • List all tables:

    $ sqlite3 <FILE> '.tables'

  • List table schema:

    $ sqlite3 <FILE> '.schema [TABLE]'

  • Create table:

    $ sqlite3 <FILE> 'CREATE TABLE <table> (<column> <DATA-TYPE>, ...);'

  • Drop table:

    $ sqlite3 <FILE> 'DROP TABLE <table>;'

Data

Syntax

  • Sqlite syntax:

    $ sqlite3 [OPTIONS] [FILE] [SQL-QUERY]

Start & Quit

  • Start sqlite3:

    $ sqlite3 [FILE]

  • Quit sqlite3:

    sqlite> .quit

Help

  • List all meta-commands:

    sqlite> .help

CLI Syntax

  • Meta-command:

    sqlite> .<COMMAND>

  • Comment:

    sqlite> #<COMMENT>

  • SQL query:

    sqlite> <SQL-QUERY>

Databases

  • Show current database:

    sqlite> .show

  • Open database (new database is created if file does not exist):

    sqlite> .open <FILE>

  • Save current database to file:

    sqlite> .save <FILE>

Tables

  • List all tables:

    sqlite> .tables
